## IEasyCallControlBase.onDisconnect property

Emits when the connection used for easy call control gets disconnected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly onDisconnect: Observable<void>;
```

## Remarks

If this observable emits, the connection and thus the Easy Call Control instance can no longer be used.

If this happens, for example, in the middle of a call, you can select a new device (or the same device with another connection) and recover the state. See [ISingleInitialState](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.md) or [IMultiInitialState](./jabra-js.imultiinitialstate.md) and for examples refer to the 'Easy Call Control' chapter of the 'Managing Calls' section of the JavaScript Developer's Guide.
